nodes.text: A clone served as a shock trooper with Coruscant Guard during the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Separatists. He was stationed at the Republic military base in Galactic City on Coruscant.

After Jedi Ahsoka Tano escaped her cell after being mistakenly arrested for the murder of Letta Turmond, this Coruscant Guard and a couple of other troopers chased her through the military base into the north corridors. The trooper sealed the area and informed Commander Fox of her direction.
